p: The enrolled subjects were screened on day 0 (baseline) and assigned to the respective canker sore and gingivitis groups for treatment were instructed to self-administer one chewable tablet containing 100â€‰mg of THCs twice daily for up to 21 days. The subjects were allowed to continue on their regular diet. The efficacy was evaluated on days 14 and 21 during the treatment period. Out of the 31 subjects in the canker sore group, one female subject dropped out after 14 days and the remaining 30 subjects completed the study. In the gingivitis group, all 29 subjects completed the study ( Figure 2).
